GSD.description:
net: usb: ax88179_178a needs FLAG_SEND_ZLP

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.134 by commit f7c1fc0dec97b882c105a0887bef585471cf1262. For more details please see the references link.
